Eric Schmidt is stepping down as CEO of Google, and Larry Page is taking over the company just announced in its earnings release. Eric Schmidt will become Executive Chairman focused on, deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership, the company says. retrospect there may have been times when more troops could have helped,'' he writes. But he insists that no formal request for more troops was made by the generals. He says Paul Bremer 's decisions inadvertently stoked nationalist resentments and fanned the embers of what would become the Iraqi insurgency . Donald Rumsfeld had favoured going into Iraq quickly and getting out quickly, handing over power to the Iraqis, but Paul Bremer favoured a slower approach. Asked about the media comparing him to former judge Paula Abdul , Steven Tyler laughed, saying it's because of the rehab rumors that dogged Paula Abdul . But he added that he'll be no Simon Cowell either. You can't say you suck, he told Howard Stern .`` Simon Cowell got off on doing that. My heart's not like that... I'm not into putting people down. I'm into bringing them up.'' He said Jennifer Lopez

took a few jabs at Simon Cowell for his squared-off, Frankenstein-esque hairdo, tight t-shirts, and how high he wears his pants.`` It's like, what's that on your neck?'' she said. Oh, it's a belt. Allen Iverson was voted an All-Star starter by the fans, a selection that has drawn criticism. The former NBA MVP and four-time scoring champion plans to play in his 11th straight All-Star game Feb. 14 at Cowboys Stadium. My fans still support me.
